detail:
OperationalError: (pymysql.err.OperationalError) (1054, "Unknown column 'users.phone_verified' in 'field list'")
[SQL: SELECT users.id AS users_id, users.email AS users_email, users.password_hash AS users_password_hash, users.`role` AS users_role, users.auth_provider AS users_auth_provider, users.first_name AS users_first_name, users.last_name AS users_last_name, users.company_name AS users_company_name, users.phone AS users_phone, users.phone_verified AS users_phone_verified, users.onboarding_completed AS users_onboarding_completed, users.is_active AS users_is_active, users.is_verified AS users_is_verified, users.created_at AS users_created_at, users.updated_at AS users_updated_at, users.last_login AS users_last_login 
FROM users 
WHERE users.email = %(email_1)s 
 LIMIT %(param_1)s]
[parameters: {'email_1': 'admin@skyrate.ai', 'param_1': 1}]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/e3q8)
